content.detailedDescription:
1.I was at karnataka and i was at the terrace of my flat.
2.I simply noticed the sky.
3.I thought it was an ufo.
4.It went in straight path and emitting colours of light.It afterwards disappeared by fading in the sky.
5.I took photograph.
6.It faded in the sky at the top of my flat.
content.summary: Ufo was coming slowly and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to bed around 12:30 am, and my bed is near a window.  looked out and saw what i thought were two stars.  but then they started moving.  once in a while, one would emit a red and green light.  the other one was visible and then not.  on and off like that. looked out the other bedroom window and saw a lot more.  do not have camera or phone.  i would have thought they were meteors, except they went up, down, and to the side.  they did not appear to be moving together in any type of coordination.  once in a while, i'd see a red and green flash from one of them, and then it was gone, and back to looking like a star, albeit moving.  i was in awe.  tried to wake my daughter up to see them, but she wouldn't wake up.  they were still there when i finally gave up and went to sleep, approximately 45 minutes later.
content.summary: Thought they were stars, but they moved up and down and sideways.

content.detailedDescription: i was attempting to sleep/astral project.Abbout 2-3 am. im feeling a strange presence..Unfriendly..Atleast unknown...I then experienced my typical sleep paralysis ive beenexperiecing these multidimensional encounters since a child. i believe im a starseed i believe their interrested in me. i also believe mufon is working to create disinfo in the ufo community. but idk who to trust anymore cus the encounters are getting physical now. so im trying to sleep and i feel a presence, i fall into sleep paralysis (when ur body create smuscle atonia to not act out ur dreamms physically which is a side affect of leaving your body) the entity caught me in the middle of leaving my body and held my ethereal body in an uncomfortable place until i let go of all fear and left my body consciously. then..I saw him...Bulbous headed grey..Taller then the worker hybrids. i then had this crazy reoccuring dream ive been having for alost 2 years now of apocolypptic scenarios in my life,ppl dying and partying  weird twisted apocolyptic celebration..Like a multidimensional ttransition everyones aware of...Everyone knkows their dead...Anyways..Iwoke up with a clogged nose ive never in my life blew my nose with this much mucus before..And behind it..Blood... so i figure.. implant?
content.summary: I felt an energetic prescence all night as usual but very strong, i remember seeing a bulbous headed greywearing black and i dreamt of greys and awoke with a bleeding nose behind a ton of mucas and plasma.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the car, waiting for husband, and saw a remarkable bright orange star near jupiter, a little up and to the left. i watched, thinking it was a plane, but it didn't mine, and the color was pumpkin orange, not red. it did seem to shimmer pink for a second. also, it seemed to move a little, especially when i looked at jupiter for a point of reference. and then, it quickly faded to black, like it was on a dimmer switch. it had been brighter than jupiter, and went dark.
content.summary: Bright orange star went out

content.detailedDescription:
While walking in my driveway at approximately 10:50pm,on 12/26/14, i observed a brighter than normal anomaly which appeared to be a star at first. it was to the left of the constellation orion, in the clear south west sky. 

because i had reported similar sightings in march and april of this year, i recognized the physical characteristics of this object. it appeared stationary, but moved quickly and changed directions constantly. it also pulsated in various colors very rapidly.

as i gazed across the many stars that were visible, i noticed a similar appearing anomaly that was extremely bright, in the south east. it had the same characteristics as the other one. no other stars appeared to have such obvious movement and pulsating colors. 

i obtained my cell phone from the house and captured both anomalies on video, where i could see the orb like shapes moving very rapidly and changing colors. the one to the south east appeared closer. after having my two daughters, age 16 and 8, come outside to witness these anomalies, i obtained my digital camera and took still photos of both. even while stabilizing the camera, the extreme distance and speed traveled by both objects was apparent. 

both objects remained in their positions while i returned inside. i then downloaded the videos and still photos onto my computer and examined them closer, where pausing the videos at various times would reveal the many colors that both objects exhibited.

as a certified nj field investigator for mufon, i have submitted to the official reporting site for independent investigation.
content.summary: Two orbs changing directions rapidly with pulsating colors

content.detailedDescription: I posted a video of the same thing last year cant believe i saw it again,it blew my mind they were going the same exact direction as last time u have my number please contact me again,u have my previous video,i hope to hear from you soon
content.summary: Ive seen this before and reported it to mufon with as video i seen the same exact object going same exact direction

content.detailedDescription: on the evening of dec.24th at approx. 11:10 pm i had just arrived home after driving some friends to their house. as i pulled up to my residence, i noticed an extremely unusual bright light that looked like a "mini-sun" the usually clouded sky's were clear and could clearly see the stars in the background.  this object "re-acted" to my horn honking and my calling my wife outside, at least i felt that way because it changed its direction and "floated" in my direction, i never let my vision lose sight of the object, my wife came outside with the camera and i was able to take a picture of the object, its kinda grainy, its the orange "blip" on the lower right corner of the picture with my neighbors houses across the street in the back ground. the object headed in the direction of the oakland international airport, i know the flight controllers had to see it because if they didn't they need to be tested, there is no way this object was man made, i used to work at the airport and i know flight characteristics of "all" known man made jets. this object flew right over me, its center was bright blue, the outer edges were like orange-yellow, it was the most beautiful thing i've ever seen in my life because it was alive. it cruised. i'm used to seeing lots of "traffic" in the skies of oakland and it can be said sometimes there are some colorful lights on some of the planes coming and going, like i said, this "object" wasn't one of ours. swamp gas and venus ?  been there done that. i know what i saw, my wife seen it too, and i snapped a picture.
content.summary: Noticed unusual bright moving light, it wasn't "one of ours" .........

content.detailedDescription:
Four days ago i was going thru some old photo files i had taken in june of 2011. in one image, a simple landscape with clouds and a blue sky above them, sagebrush in the foreground, i noticed what i thought was a speck on my screen. when i realized it wasn't,  i enlarged it to 100% to get a better look. i was startled to see what looked to me like the "standard" ufo commonly portrayed by a lot of the media. 

as i was taking the picture, back in 2011, i didn't notice anything unusual in the sky or audibly.  i do remember that it was very calm, no wind at all. 

this is the second time within last 3 yrs i've experienced this. i wrote to mufon a couple of yrs ago about a photograph taken in yachats early one morning which i later found contained 2 oddly shaped, highly reflective silvery objects in the sky, over the ocean. hopefully, you still have that report on file.

i would be interested to learn what you and whoever else sees this image think about all of this?

thank you
content.summary: Dark grey

content.detailedDescription: I was delivering newspapers with my mother, just outside of a small town. something got her attention in the sky, and she got my attention of it, as well. looking out the windsheild of our car, i saw a large, pulsating green light moving very quickly across the morning sky. in about a second, it crossed, in a straight line, from the middle of the sky to above some clouds that appeared to be a great distance away. i looked back in the direction it came from to see a much smaller thing travelling in the same direction, much slower, and two blinking lights on the front, one side red, the other blue. the object appeared to be boomarang shaped, the bow being the front, with an air tail following it. i think that last may be human, but the first, i suspect, may be of alien, or spacial origin. during and after the event occurred, i was distracted and felt much anticipation and excitement about what we might have just seen.
content.summary: Large, pulsating green light crossed sky, nw to se, in only a few seconds. it was followed by some other aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: Worked  for santa barbara police dept. my partner and i were at leadbetter beach looking for a runaway child at 1a.M.. we observed 2 bright lights about 100 above the water apps. 200 feet apart. they came from the direction of vandenberg a.F.B. in lompoc ca.. and flew down to oxnard ca. the miles by air around 90 miles. observation time was less than 5 seconds. we knew we had seen something that was faster than anything we have.
content.summary: Saw 2 bright lights in excesses of 2000 m.P.H.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a cigarette.  facing to the east i can observe flight paths going into logan international airport (boston, ma).  i noticed in the corner of my eye at about a 55 degree angle a red light come into view.  attitude was quite high.  the object then covered the entire skyline probably over 150 miles of skyline in under 1 min and 30 sec.  i lost sight of it as it passed behind my neighbors house.  there was no sound along with the light and the light was steady.  as soon as a saw it i knew it was not an aircraft.  the light never changed no mater angle the object was at.  i am also confident that it was not a satellite because i never been able to see them because of the city lights off in the distance.
content.summary: Fast moving object cover skyline in less then 2 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I looked up my house on google maps and in the sky there's a ufo and eat looks like long white trails. if i is a orange red i wish you would look up the address and do a 180 pan up in the sky. i don't know how it would get on google maps thank you
content.summary: I look up my house on google maps and was at street level speedup anita there

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling with my wife along i-195 west at 12:26am, approximately where rte-641 (n new prospect road over passes i-195)it was a very clear starlit early morning, when we both turned to notice a bright starlight globe of yellowy light traveling at very high speed (south of our position, paralleling i-195) traveling from east to west.

the object appeared to be slightly above local air traffic at about a 30 degree angle from our position, following an arc. it did not appear to be a meteorite due to no tail or noise, the low angle, and path of travel. it also appeared to be to low for any passing satellites. 

we watched the object for approximately 3 seconds before it just blinked out and disappeared. i would estimate the object to be traveling approx. 6 to 7 times faster than passing high altitude passenger aircraft.
content.summary: High speed globe of light travelling a very high speed east to west in an arc which disapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the beach with friends,
suddenly appears in the sea within a cloud at low altitude,
caught my attention because it's not normal for me,
intense white light at low altitude, within a cloud, when looking at the sea was already there, after 15 minutes, walked away from the shore, so in the sea, and the sky.
i felt special because i knew it was not a plane or a flare, or a kite, nothing normal,or an emergency flare of a ship. i feel a strange energy in the area, i hedgehog skin, people on the beach did not realize, just some, he went to the shore inward sea, increasing its height, disappearing
content.summary: Light at low altitude, moving within a cloud

content.detailedDescription: While camping  alone on a hilltop in the allegany mountains near salamanca n.Y not far from the p.A. border, my campfire had died down and i was about to retire for the evening. i noticed a bright white light downhill from my position aprox.100 to 200 yards away, i at first thought it was a bright spotlight the kind people use to spot deer at night, but then it began to rise slowly until it was above the tree tops it paused above the trees and changed from white to a blue green then back  to white. it then accelerated at a tremendous speed and dissappered leaving a trail of light behind it it was difficult to judge the size not knowing its true distance from me and being so dark but holding my thumb up at arms lenght it covered the object i could not make out its form but it appered to be round that was the last i saw of it.
content.summary: Bright pulsating white and changing to blue green rose above treeline then rose upward stopped then quickly accelerated leaving a trail of light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road and noticed a very bright light. didn't think much of it, then i saw another one, and then again another one. i thought, wow that's strange to have so many helicopters flying around. then the further down the road and closer to them i got, i noticed a sky full of them!  i swerved off the road and grabbed my phone to take a video. shaking i hit the wrong button and could not get the stupid video to turn on. i stood there and watched them as the floated away. managed to get one pic of 5 of them
content.summary: Approx 15 red,orange orbs hovering and slowly heading in a westerly direction. they were seen again 3 hours later

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside and saw approximately 15-20 orange lights moving in a southeasterly direction. they appeared to be spaced fairly evenly apart. i asked friend to take photo of them, she had to go inside to get camera so she only got 2 pics.  they did not blink or flicker and made no sound. everyone went back inside but me, i watched until they went out of view, while watching them another light appeared from the northwest. it seemed to be going faster than the others. it followed the same path as the other lights.  several people around this area saw them also. i felt i was looking at something very unusual and i watched u til they flew out of sight!  "it" appeared to have a predetermined trajectory and no light chaned speeds.
content.summary: Lights moving toward southeast

content.detailedDescription: It was christmas night. me and my boyfriend were driving back from new orleans after seeing christmas in the oaks.  we were on the interstate in gonzales heading towards essen ln. in baton rouge. i was talking to him, when my eye caught movement in the sky.  it was slowly coming at a distance, but then quickened and stopped in the night sky.  it hovered for a moment.  it reminded me of a stingray at first because it was an odd shape.  i mouthed, what is that? i studied it for a while trying to figure out what it was.  it was very large and dark.  it had a dome on the top of it's disc like structure.  i only realized it to be a ufo when i saw many circular lights at the bottom of it.  they were dimly lit.  on top of the dome was a bluish color light.  i've never seen something like that in my life!  my boyfriend asked what i was looking at, but i was speechless.  i was afraid of what i saw, and didn't talk for a minute.  he asked me if it was a ufo. i said it was. there were not many cars on the road since it was late.  i believe there was one a good distance in front of us, and another far behind us in the opposite lane. there wasn't anything around except trees lining the sides of the interstate. i will never forget what i saw.  it was incredible and i had a good view. i'm sure it was about thirty seconds of me being able to observe it, but it seemed longer.  it had my full attention. the sky was clear and had enough lighting for me to make out the shapes.  we drove underneath it.  he wanted to turn around, but i didn't want to go back out of fear.  my mother saw something similar when she was a girl. it was the same shape, but she said that the lights on the bottom were projecting different colors. i only have memory of the object, but i looked at photos online after seeing it, and i am convinced that there really is something out there.  ufo's are very real.
content.summary: Ufo appeared in the night sky at a distance, then got closer and hovered over the intersate.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car and at the intersection of raritan road and lake avenue. i made a left turn and saw something incredible. i jumped out of my vehicle and started video taping about a minute after i saw it. it came above the tree line of oak ridge golf course and hovered on a straight flight path ne before changing direction to nw. the object was a stark white disc/orb on the top. that had a red/orange glowing on the bottom. it was almost like a diamond/square when you put both the glowing bottom and disc/orb top together. i was feeling adrenaline as i have a flight path for commercial jetliners mear my house from (newark international airport) i was always looking to see if i could find something weird. this was now where near the normal air lane and it was quite low and moved very slowly and deliberately ne. it then made a hook nw and disappeared quickly into the dark night. i am at work today 12/26 while writing this i will upload the video later.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It was christmas eve/christmas day 12:01 am, i was on my way to conveniance stoor when i saw something bizzare i stopped my vehicle immediately and pulled out my phone and video taped the object.

content.detailedDescription: Saw a large triangle with what looked like a rounded center with a bunch of white lights had red lights at the end of the "wings" if you want to call them that. way too swept back for a jet. triangular in shape. about 500 feet up going maybe 50mph or less. passed very slow and very low with almost no sound. what sound there was followed behind it and was very faint. you would expect the sound to follow behind a jet at high speed but this thing was creeping along. flew right over the top of my house. i was in the yard watching it come in for about 2 minutes because it was so huge and low but i heard nothing as it flew over the top of me i could start to hear the sound behind it. sounded a good quarter mile off and was very faint. i have lived near and around airports for most of my life and no jet can go that slow and be that quiet. this thing was big and quiet. freaky. my son who is 25 and my 18 yr old niece also saw it for what its worth.
content.summary: Triangle. low and slow. big as a jet, way too slow.

content.detailedDescription: A star like light caught my interest because it appeared backlit. i called my man out to see it because it looked like it was ascending. it is brighter than sirius and originally about 35 degrees above the horizon; it's currently 90 above us. we were making dinner no drugs or alcohol were involved. at first i thought it was the iss but the hovering, random seeming lefts and rights quickly took that off of the maybe list. it was still hovering over 3 hours later.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A star like light caught my interest because it appeared backlit. i called my man out to see it because it looked like it was ascending. it is brighter than sirus and originally about 35 degrees above the horizon; it's currently 90 above us

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i returned from dinner to maui beach hotel in maui, hawaii
i was looking at the sky and saw reddish orange golf ball sized objects in the sky moving in a straight slanted line in the upward direction. these objects vanished after a while. we also showed them to a person in the hotel. he thought those were chinese lanterns. i feel they were ufos.

first i saw 3 and then 2. i recorded the video using my iphone.Please ignore small green objects if any. those are flies. but do focus on the orange objects.

i always wanted to spot ufo's. maybe this is one such sighting.
content.summary: Reddish orange lughts observed in sky

content.detailedDescription: I saw roughly 5 pairs of reddish-orange spheres moing in the night sky. they appeared to be in low earth orbit, similar to viewing the isis in orbit. very bright, unlike anything else in the night sky. they appeared to be moving from east to west.  i have vedeo on my phone. very interesting.
content.summary: Roughly 5 pairs of redish spheres.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to front porch to smoke a cigarette with my partner. we were observing the night sky because it hasnt been a clear night in a while. i saw a single light off to the east (where our porch faces) and it was considerably brighter than than stars and double a star size. i joked to my partner about it be is the same bouncing white light i saw at night a few weeks ago while outside smoking on the phone with her. she observed it and noticed it was moving. we both stared at it for over an hour.  it appeared to have a small companion red light separate but always near it however it bounced around all sides of light. the main white light itself would move move very slowly towards us but shift side to side as appearing to be caught in a wind current. it kept its reserve ever slowly bouncing and weaving. it's main light was solid and but its companion would flick at random intervals. it appeared to be relatively low in the sky maybe 3000-5000 feet but not sure. commercial airplanes would fly behind it. it moved opposite and faster than stars and appeared to be moving directly west towards our house. we watched for over 1.5 hours before we went to bed.
content.summary: Slow moving light pacing an odd path

content.detailedDescription: As i pulled into my driveway i looked up and saw a bright long light shoot across the sky right over the woods behind our house. the was a strange hum in the air and as it passed it made a swoosh sound.
content.summary: It flew from one end of the sky to the other on a straight path.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home and just about to pull of the main road into my complex when i saw these lights in the sky. i think i first saw two of them. i pulled into the suicide lane where i turn left and just sat there, stunned, finally thought to turn on my emergency lights.

tried to get pic or video but new ipod and couldn't figure it out. may have something for a fraction of a second but probably just be reflections.

my immediate thought was, what are those? they look like luminaria. they seemed to be vertical and i think there was a red band and a yellow or orange band horizontally. sorry, these would have been bands of light.

i was sitting facing due east at 333 cirby way, in the middle of cirby way. the lights seemed low, like maybe kite-height and they meandered. they all continued in the same direction, south-south-west i would guess, but they kind of flew around some, as if they were just enjoying the ride.

i kept trying to watch and trying to figure out the video and hoping they'd come back. i must have watched for about 1 or 2 minutes when they got so far away to the south i could barely see them.

for some reason i think there were the two at first, then four, and it seems like at some point there were only three, as they got farther and dimmer.

i have never seen anything like it in my life, i have never reported or fancied i've seen a ufo. i'm still stunned a half hour later. i called the police station and some fire guy answered, totally uninterested. he didn't take my name, said he had my address and he'd tell someone but i wonder if he really will.
content.summary: I saw 4 lights, my first thought was looked just like lumaria, vertical cylinder maybe? red, orange, possible one above the other.

content.detailedDescription: I want to tell what we all three saw
content.summary: I want to be called

content.detailedDescription:
Walking south on upland avenue a bright orange/red light appeared in the distance, it came closer over the millmont area of reading, pa and got brighter until it lit a large area of the sky, it made no sound.

i noticed the light due to the vivid color and intense brightness. also, it was a hazy night, and the intense light illuminated a massive oval area of haze around the central circle of extremely bright light as it neared.

initially i thought the light was a medical helicopter from a nearby hospital, however, the color was wrong and it was silent. the hospital is maybe a mile north of this event.

the jagged edge, circular light was slowly heading north, maybe 500 feet above the ground, it got larger and brighter as it got closer. at its closest, maybe a half mile away, it began moving left, right, up and down in a slow, erratic way. then it began descending in a slow, smooth arc to the east, until it disappeared as it neared the house/tree top level. the entire event took only a couple of minutes.

i was very excited by the slow moving light, as i had never viewed anything like it before. when it was over, i was perplexed by what i just saw. i still have no explanation for the intense, nearby and quiet light.

the light simply disappeared, i do not know if it navigated behind something, or went out. i scanned the area for maybe 15 minutes, and it never appeared again. it was really a spectacular sight, which is why i am writing this. sadly, i did not think to take pictures, as i'm older, and forget my phone has a camera in it now.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Extreemly bright, large, silent orange/red light over the millmont section of reading pa appeared out of south got larger, brighter decended below tree line.

content.detailedDescription: This is my second sighting in my neighborhood in the nine months. i live close to the everglades. i came out to walk my dog between 9:20 - 9:30 pm on christmas night 2014. i looked in the sky and saw an orange spherical light moving across the sky in a gliding motion. it was about the size of the moon when it's in the far sky or i guess like the size of a globe. i thought that it was strange that it did not make a sound although it was so low. coming from the eastern to western direction, was a plane at about the same height that was clearly different in shape, the color of the light was different, and i could clearly see the wings of the plane and lights at the end of them, i could also clearly hear the sound of the plane.. this reaffirmed to me that the first light i saw was clearly not a plane. i was standing in the street of my cul de sac and watched the light as it came from my left side (north), until it went over me and toward the right of me (south), and as far as i could see it until it disappeared behind the clouds...What was even more strange, and i thought my eyes were playing tricks...But as it went into the clouds, i could no longer see the light but i saw a dark figure of the object as it moved through the clouds and went past the roof of a two story house...Which was as far as i could see it in the sky.
content.summary: Spherical orange light moving in a glide-like motion on a straight path below the clouds with no sound

content.detailedDescription: Dad and grandfather saw orb in front of house. went out to see other people on the street looking up then saw the 2 orbs coming from east to west then truned back to east hovered for 1 min then then took off straight up never made noise
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 red orange orbs
